name: Labyrinth of Minotaur
description:
While manipulating unity-chan
Run away from Minotaur
Please escape the labyrinth

Move on the left side of the screen, and operate on the right side
Stopping in the magic square or in front of the treasure box
The gauge is displayed and accumulates with time

The magic square will disappear when the gauge fills up
When the four magic square are annihilated the last magic square will appear
An exit appears by disappearing the last magic square

In the treasure chest other than recovery of physical strength (heart)
Red treasure chest with red door key
Blue treasure chest with blue door key

Magic square and treasure chest gauge informs Minotaur to whereabouts
Because stepping on a spider will also know whereabouts you are
Avoid spiders as much as possible.

Sometimes a blue spider and a green spider will occur somewhere in the labyrinth
Blue spider doubles the attack power of Minotaur, and 1.25 times faster walking
A green spider will halve the gauge's accumulation rate
Both are solved by searching for a spider and stepping on it


This work is provided under Unity chan license terms
